title: Static Site Generation - Deployment Features
description: Specifications for deployment features in static site generation (GitHub Pages support, SEO files, base path configuration)

x-specs.given: a static site configured for GitHub Pages deployment
x-specs.when: static site is generated with deployment: 'github-pages'
x-specs.then: .nojekyll file should be created in output root to allow underscore-prefixed files and directories

expectedOutput.purpose: Disable Jekyll processing on GitHub Pages

useCases: GitHub Pages: Allow _next/, _app/, and other underscore-prefixed directories
Jekyll bypass: Prevent GitHub from processing files with Jekyll
Conditional: Only generate .nojekyll when deployment is 'github-pages'
assertions: Create empty .nojekyll file in output root
File must be present for GitHub Pages deployment
Allow underscore-prefixed directories and files (_next/, _app/)
Handle special GitHub Pages paths correctly
Only generate when deployment is set to 'github-pages'

x-specs.given: a static site with multiple pages and SEO metadata
x-specs.then: sitemap.xml should be generated with all public pages, priorities, and lastmod dates

expectedOutput.format: Valid XML with <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> header

useCases: SEO: Help search engines discover all pages
Changefreq: Signal update frequency (daily, weekly, monthly)
Noindex exclusion: Skip /admin and other private pages
assertions: Generate valid XML sitemap with proper schema
Include all public pages with their URLs
Exclude pages marked with noindex
Add priority and changefreq values from meta
Include lastmod dates for all URLs

x-specs.given: a static site with pages and sitemap configuration
x-specs.then: robots.txt should be created with User-agent rules and sitemap reference

application.expectedContent:
User-agent: *
Allow: /
Allow: /about
Disallow: /admin
Disallow: /api
Sitemap: https://example.com/sitemap.xml
Crawl-delay: 1
useCases: Sitemap reference: Point crawlers to sitemap.xml
Crawl delay: Optional rate limiting for bots
assertions: Create robots.txt with User-agent rules
Allow crawling of public pages by default
Disallow pages with noindex/nofollow meta
Include sitemap URL reference
Support custom crawl delay if configured

x-specs.given: a static site configured for subdirectory deployment (basePath: /docs)
x-specs.then: all internal links and asset references should be prefixed with base path

useCases: GitHub Pages with repo name: /repo-name base path
assertions: Prefix all internal links with base path (/docs/about)
Update asset references with base path (/docs/assets/output.css)
Adjust image and script src attributes (/docs/logo.png)
Update canonical and hreflang URLs (https://example.com/docs/)
Support subdirectory deployment correctly
